info.title: Freshservice
info.description: Freshservice is a cloud-based IT service desk and service management solution that's easy to set up and use, to transform employee experience across the organization.

get.description: Triggers when a new ticket is created.
get.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, create a ticket.

put.description: Update a ticket (only specified values will be updated).

post.summary: Add a note to a ticket

post.summary: Add a note to a ticket (V2)
post.description: Add a private or public note to a ticket.

requester_id.description: User-id of the requester. For existing contacts, requester_id can be passed instead of email.

priority.description: The priority of the ticket (such as Low, Medium, or High).

urgency.description: Urgency of the problem (such as Low, Medium or High).

impact.description: Impact of the problem (such as Low, Medium or High).

source.description: The channel through which the ticket was created.

body.description: The note to be added to the ticket.

private.description: Set to true if message is private.

deleted.description: Set as true if the ticket is deleted/trashed. Deleted tickets will not be considered in any views except 'deleted' filter.

display_id.description: Ticket Id specific to your account.

group_id.description: Id of Group to which the ticket is assigned.

impact.description: A number representing the impact of the problem.

isescalated.description: Set to true if an escalation was sent.

owner_id.description: Id of the agent to whom the problem is assigned.

priority.description: A number representing the priority of the ticket.

requester_id.description: User-id of the requester. For existing contacts, requester_id can be passed instead of email.

responder_id.description: Id of the agent to whom the ticket is assigned.

source.description: A number representing the channel through which the ticket was created.

spam.description: Set as true if the ticket is marked as spam.

status.description: A number representing the status of the ticket.

ticket_type.description: Type property field as defined in ticket fields.

to_email.description: Email address to which the incoming ticket email was sent.

urgency.description: A number representing the urgency of the problem.

description_html.description: HTML content of the ticket. Description and description_html should not be passed together.

responder_name.description: Name of the agent to whom the ticket is assigned.

to_emails.description: Email addresses to which the incoming ticket email was sent.

assoc_problem_id.description: Id of the associated problem to the ticket.

active.description: Set to true if the user is verified.
